description: Set apart from the ruckus of the pub, a counter stands beside the
wall.  Unlike the disarray of the large room, it is neat and tidy
here, piles of papers meticulously kept on a desk behind the counter.
Closed doors lead in two directions, and a stairwell leads up to the
second level.  A rope blocks the stairs off, and a sign hanging from
it directs people to the counter.
39414.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x

description: The hallway is wide, enough room for many to walk abreast without
being crowded.  Doors line the walls, paintings hanging between them
that depict images of the sea.  A large window is at the end of the
hallway, covered with transparent curtains that are pulled to the
side.  To the west the door is marked with a bronze "5," to the east a
bronze "6."
39419.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x

description: The rented rooms of the inn are plain.  The walls are solid white
with a trim of wood around the bottom, and the floors are wood covered
with a dark green area rug.  To either side of the bed is a small oak
table, and a chamber pot is tucked into the corner.  A candlestick
stands on one of the tables.
39421.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x: {GR{goom {C5{x

description: This tavern has long been abandoned.  The tables are covered up
with old sheets, the chairs haphazardly stacked on tables, or broken
on the floor.  There is a bar but nothing is left but empty bottles
and broken glasses.  Perhaps the tavern went out of business because
of the foul smell coming from the sewers, or because of the violent
flaming fist soldiers stationed accross the road.
39407.name: An Abandoned Tavern

description: A small, quiet tavern, the Splurging Sturgeon certainly lives up to
its name.  The walls are lined with expensive looking mounts for
pitifully small catches, and the tables are each covered with a
sullied white cloth embroidered with nautical symbols along the edges.
Behind the bar, a long mirror is surrounded by shelves of mugs
chiseled with designs.
39434.name: Splurging Sturgeon

description: A blanket is laid out on the roof here, a brown cloth torn and
ragged from much use.  Brought out most days, it welcomes visitors to
take a seat and enjoy either the view of the ocean to the south or the
view of the sky overhead.  The rolling waves of the sea can just
barely be heard from here, as well as the sounds from the dockyards
below.
39441.name: {WO{wn {Bt{bhe {WR{woof{x

description: The short hallway comes to an end here with a window.  Gauzy
curtains drape on either side of the window, tied with thick green
ribbon.  Below, the small windowledge holds a tiny potted flower,
tentatively blooming in the light.  Closed doors lead in both
directions, but only one appears to be unlocked.
39429.name: Cozy Bed and Breakfast

description: Tucked into the corner is a standup piano, positioned so players
can see the crowd.  The tables fan out around it, seats scattered and
extra chairs pulled over.  Straight above the piano is a hanging
light, scattering the corner's shadows.  Music is scattered over the
top of the piano.
39437.name: {BT{bhe {WB{wlade {BA{bnd {WS{wtars{x

description: The rented rooms of the inn are plain.  The walls are solid white
with a trim of wood around the bottom, and the floors are wood covered
with a dark green area rug.  To either side of the bed is a small oak
table, and a chamber pot is tucked into the corner.  A candlestick
stands on one of the tables.
39422.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x: {GR{goom {C4{x

description: The famous mermaid painting hands on the wall here in all its
glory.  At close inspection, the signature of the artist can be seen
in the bottom corner, though it is too scribbled to be legible.  On
the other wall of the corner a large, mounted fish has been hung, a
tiny bronze plaque announcing its owner and size.  A few tables stand
here, covered in full and empty drinks, the chairs scattered
haphazardly.
39411.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x

description: Shelves are everywhere, holding every size and shape of box that
could fit.  Piles of spare sheets and pillows are in one corner, and
an open box of candles sits on a shelf near the door.  Toward the back
of the room, larger boxes sit on the floor, just enough room left
between them to walk.  A single light hangs from the ceiling, dangling
precariously on a single cord.
39415.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x: {GS{gtorage{x

description: The rented rooms of the inn are plain.  The walls are solid white
with a trim of wood around the bottom, and the floors are wood covered
with a dark green area rug.  To either side of the bed is a small oak
table, and a chamber pot is tucked into the corner.  A candlestick
stands on one of the tables.
39423.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x: {GR{goom {C3{x

description: Looking out from this point, most of Baldur's Gate can be seen.  To
the north, the Elfsong Tavern stands, its doors opening and closing to
all sorts of folk; to the west, the city stretches out, homes and
buildings spread, streets criss-crossing.  The roof itself is
unadorned, flat and plain.
39440.name: {WO{wn {Bt{bhe {WR{woof{x

description: Small and cozy, this inn is more a small home than an inn.  The
walls are decorates with tapestries and the furniture is hand-carved
wood.  A circular knit rug lays on the floor, dark green and brown,
giving the room an earthy feel.  Two rocking chairs and a couch all
face each other, and a long table at the side of the room serves as a
counter.
39405.name: Ye Olde Inn

description: Shelves and boxes are piled high in this room.  Cramped and
claustrophobic, it does not look like it is meant to be lingered in; a
thin layer of dust lies on the floor, the outline of boxes clearly
visible.  A small collection of chests line the far wall, and a single
makou-powered light dangles from the ceiling, casting odd shadows.
39436.name: Splurging Sturgeon Storeroom

description: Small pebbles are scattered over the roof, clattering underfoot.  A
low ledge runs around the edge of the roof, no more than a foot high;
the barkeep below is sure not to let anyone up who may fall over.  To
the east, the wall of the city is not far.
39442.name: {WO{wn {Bt{bhe {WR{woof{x

description: The atmosphere of the Blade and Stars is a merry one.  At all times
of day, visitors and locals alike can be found scattered around the
large room, talking and drinking.  Much laughter fills the air, along
with the smells of food and, at night, the crackling of a fire in the
fireplace.  Tables are scattered around the room, some empty.
39400.name: {BT{bhe {WB{wlade {BA{bnd {WS{wtars{x

description: The landed on the spiral staircase is a subtle one, easy for drunk
and sober alike to find their way up and down.  A gentle slope leads
the rest of the way up to the roof proper.  Overhead, the sky opens,
seeming to go on forever; from below, sounds filter up onto the roof
of the tavern, muffled vaguely.
39439.name: {WO{wn {Bt{bhe {WR{woof{x

description: Booths are tucked into the corner, a light hanging over each table
and casting dull light.  In times past, this may have been a place for
a romantic interlude; now, the seats of the booths were ripped and the
tables dirty.  Still clinging to its former life, beautiful wood
carvings of the sea hang on the wall above each table.
39410.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x

description: A tall bar is set up by the wall, racks of glasses standing tall
behind it.  In the center of the racks is a long, wide mirror; a thin
shen of dust covers it, marked with fingerprints and other scuffs.
Stools line the front of the bar, and napkins are spread haphazardly
over its surface.  The floor is mildly sticky from spills not yet
cleaned up.
39409.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x

description: The sounds of the inn outside are muffled here, barely filtering
through the door when it is closed.  Wooden walls are bare of any
decoration, but a series of shelves hold various papers and books.  A
pair of comfortable-looking chairs stand in the middle of the room,
and a plush, extravagent chair sits behind the desk.
39416.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x: {GO{gffice{x

description: The smell of cooking fish hangs in the thick air of the tavern,
adding ambiance to the decor.  Tables are scattered sparsely, leaving
a good deal of room the move around, a tribute to the amount of
business the tavern does.  A dart board hangs on the wall, darts stuck
into it haphazardly, and a chalk board hangs beside it for scoring.
39435.name: Splurging Sturgeon

description: The first sight newcomers to the inn see is a huge painting of a
mermaid smiling coyly on the far wall.  Painted skillfully, it waves
coquettishly across the room from its spot lounging on the rocks by
the sea.  The room, filled with tables, is dimly lit and smells
faintly of fish.  Despite being in the upper half of the city, it is a
favorite of sailors, drawing them from the harbor.
39408.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x

description: The hallway is wide, enough room for many to walk abreast without
being crowded.  Doors line the walls, paintings hanging between them
that depict images of the sea.  A large window is at the end of the
hallway, covered with transparent curtains that are pulled to the
side.  To the west the door is marked with a bronze "3," to the east a
bronze "4."
39418.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x

description: The rented rooms of the inn are plain.  The walls are solid white
with a trim of wood around the bottom, and the floors are wood covered
with a dark green area rug.  To either side of the bed is a small oak
table, and a chamber pot is tucked into the corner.  A candlestick
stands on one of the tables.
39425.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x: {GR{goom {C1{x

description: A long bar stands near the wall, a cigar box sitting at one end and
various bowls of peanuts dotting its length.  The scent of a pungent
cigar hangs in the air; it overpowers the smell of alcohol and is like
few cigars known.  No mirror hangs behind the bar.  Instead, a
backwards clock is on the wall, ticking the seconds away.  Faded on
the floor is a scuffed chalk line.
39401.name: {BT{bhe {WB{wlade {BA{bnd {WS{wtars{x

description: Clutter is everywhere!  The floor is hidden beneath a layer of
clothing and personal belongings.  A desk sits against one wall,
covered in papers, books, and envelopes; opposite it, the bed is a
mess of blankets.  Wide open, the closet is piled high with boxes,
trapping what few clothes have been hung against the back wall.  A
dirty plate sits on the windowsill beneath a window covered with green
curtains.
39432.name: Cozy Bed and Breakfast

description: The floor is strangely clean despite the bowls of peanuts that sit
on nearly every table.  Glasses clang together in toasts and voices
rise and fall as conversations carry on, and there is much laughter in
the air.  On the wall hangs a dart board, darts sticking out at
awkward angles; the tables part to give players room.  A narrow
chalkboard hangs beside the board, but does not look often used.
39403.name: {BT{bhe {WB{wlade {BA{bnd {WS{wtars{x

description: This place is a mess.  Shattered glass and nut shells litter the
sticky floor, and the air is filled with smoke and shouts.  On the
walls, dart boards and windows are mingled, the boards well worn and
the windows cracked.  The bar is tucked into the corner, a swinging
gate on one side to allow the bartended in and out; there are no seats
around it.
39443.name: The Singing Shield

description: A wide archway opens in the wall here, leading further into the
building.  Tables are offset to each other, leaving just enough room
to slip through, though chairs have been discarded and some toppled in
the way.  Overhead, one of the lights is out, the others left to fend
off the shadows that gather close.
39412.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x

description: Spotless and simply decorated, the room is quaint.  Woven wheat and
other craft works hang on the wall, each obviously made by hand with
care.  A small fireplace sits against one wall, the mantle covered
with small portraits of children young and old, and a wreath of vines
and leaves hangs above it.  Unlit during the day, at night a roaring
fire fills the room with warmth.
39427.name: Cozy Bed and Breakfast

description: The rented rooms of the inn are plain.  The walls are solid white
with a trim of wood around the bottom, and the floors are wood covered
with a dark green area rug.  To either side of the bed is a small oak
table, and a chamber pot is tucked into the corner.  A candlestick
stands on one of the tables.
39424.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x: {GR{goom {C2{x

description: Meticulously clean, the bedroom offered to guests is decorated in
the same rustic style of the lower floor.  A bed, covered with a green
blanket, sits against the wall and has a hand-knit throw laying across
its foot.  There is a vanity in one corner, its mirror spotless, and a
door leads to the closet.
39431.name: Cozy Bed and Breakfast

description: The front door opens into a small hallway.  Walls decorated with
beige paint and flowered trim lead down to a window opposite the door,
the floor lined with a plush carpet.  A few doors dot the walls, the
one opening leading to a small room to the west.
39426.name: Cozy Bed and Breakfast

description: A large, heart-shaped decoration hangs on the wall at the end of
the hallway, woven of wheat mixed with small, dried flowers and
colorful ribbons.  Below it stands a small table made of oak that has
been set snug against the wall.  Leading off the hallway is a door, a
small "Do Not Disturb" sign hanging from the knob.
39433.name: Cozy Bed and Breakfast

description: A sterile smell hangs in the air heavily, a mix of cleaners and a
perfume fragrance that assaults most nostrils vengefully.  The room is
almost painfully white, small green leafs painted onto the tiles of
the floor adding the only splash of color.  Tucked against the wall is
a washbasin, a mirror hanging above it, and a cloudy, transluscent
shower curtain separates off the tub.
39428.name: Cozy Bed and Breakfast

description: The tables are spread out father than usual here, creating an arc
out from the wall.  In the center of the arc, a grand spiral staircase
rises up to the second floor.  Wrought of iron, it is skillfully
designed, sturdy and artful.  It catches the light and gleams subtly.
39402.name: {BT{bhe {WB{wlade {BA{bnd {WS{wtars{x

description: An open doorway leads between the main room and the bedroom.  On
the wall are tapestries similar to those in the other room, and a rug
on the floor looks to be made by the same hand.  A window opens out
onto the street, covered with homemade curtains.  Bunkbeds stand on
two sides of the room, snug against the walls.
39406.name: Ye Olde Inn

description: The landing to the stairwell is small, cramped further by a low
table sitting against the wall.  It is intricately carved, designs
worked into the legs and around the edge of the tabletop.  A hallway
branches off, and a closed door leads off in one direction.
39430.name: Cozy Bed and Breakfast

description: Clustering here, a group of tables are gathered near the piano.
Those that are empty are covered with empties, all gathered in the
center of each table.  A large fireplace stands in the corner, tucked
against the wall; every night, a large fire is carefully tended in it.
The mantle is ornate, brick and wood and kept very clean.
39438.name: {BT{bhe {WB{wlade {BA{bnd {WS{wtars{x

description: The rented rooms of the inn are plain.  The walls are solid white
with a trim of wood around the bottom, and the floors are wood covered
with a dark green area rug.  To either side of the bed is a small oak
table, and a chamber pot is tucked into the corner.  A candlestick
stands on one of the tables.
39420.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x: {GR{goom {C6{x

description: The hallway is wide, enough room for many to walk abreast without
being crowded.  Doors line the walls, paintings hanging between them
that depict images of the sea.  A large window is at the end of the
hallway, covered with transparent curtains that are pulled to the
side.  To the west the door is marked with a bronze "1," to the east a
bronze "2."
39417.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x

description: Tables and chairs are crammed into this corner, giving patrons
little elbow room.  Fishing trophies hang on the walls, and empty
glasses are scattered on both the tables and the floor.  Someone has
left out a decimated bowl of beer nuts, the remaining contents
scattered everywhere.  One of the lights overhead rocks gently, caught
in the breeze from a crack in the wall.
39413.name: {GT{ghe {RB{rlu{ysh{rin{Rg {GM{ge{cr{Cm{ca{gi{Gd {GI{gnn{x

description: Built into the south east tower of the Baldur's Gate city wall is a
small old tavern.  The tall oak beams that run accross the ceiling
give an old farmhouse style theme to the tavern.  There are several
old fashioned sets of tables and chairs set out where the old folk of
the tavern can sing old songs, drink and be merry.
39404.name: The Gatehouse Tavern

description:
A friendly looking fellow, he is large and jolly looking.  His eyes
twinkle and his lips are more often than not turned up into a grin
behind a fat cigar.  Red hair covered his head faintly, thin on top,
and laugh lines crinkle and dance around his eyes.  He wears an apron
around his waist and a casual shirt.
39401.room_name: An overweight bartender smiles behind his cigar.
39401.name: Callahan~

description:
Unassuming, she sits in her rocker with a blanket folded over her
legs.  Her eyes are a friendly green, her hair grey and wrapped in a
bun at the back of her head.  Wrinkles crease her once-smooth skin,
and there is a weathered look to her.  Her hands move with confidence,
the sign of her ability as a healer.
39402.room_name: A kind, elderly woman rocks in her chair.
39402.name: a kind woman~

description:
Barely out of his youth, he looks somewhat anxious and awkward. 
His body is well built, though he carries a little more weight than he
ought to.  A bored expression in his brown eyes, he stands with his
back against the wall, arms crossed.  A tousled black, his hair is in
disarray, shaggy and messed.
39403.room_name: Standing behind the counter, a young man looks bored.
39403.name: a young man~

description:
The swagger in this man's step and the cut of his jaw make him an
opposing figure.  Black stubble covers his face in a short beard, and
a scar runs above his left eye.  Wearing breeches and a sleeveless
shirt, his muscled arms are visible, revealing the ornate tattoo on
his upper right arm.  This man was once a sailor, and a brave one;
there can be no doubt of that.
39404.room_name: A grizzled man stands behind the bar.
39404.name: the barkeep~

39405.d_flags: D Groans and crumples with a choked sob.~
description:
Her blonde hair pulled back into a bun, a few strands have fallen
loose, floating around her heart-shaped face.  By appearances, she
could be no more than 25, her skin smooth and delicate, her hazel eyes
shimmering with optimism.  She is of slight build, though a few extra
pounds cling to her; she is neither fat nor thin, and seems content
with that.  Wearing plain clothes, an apron is tied around her waist,
smeared with dirt and flour.
39405.room_name: A young woman in an apron stands here, humming to herself.
39405.name: Therese~

description:
He is a skinny stick of a man, face dotted with the scars of acne
in his youth and a nose that looks too large for his face.  Blonde
hair sits in a mat on his head, tugged to the side in a poor combover.
Meticulate, his clothes are a sailor's outfit a few sizes too big,
likely bought for too much platinum by a passing ship worker.  He
fidgets under the gaze of most in the tavern, moving awkwardly behind
the bar.
39406.room_name: A lanky, wannabe sailor stands behind the bar.
39406.name: the barkeep~

description:
Muscular and large, he is not tall but he has a good deal of
strength.  A thick beard hangs from his chin, and bushy eyebrows sit
over his dark, menacing eyes.  His bald head is kept bare, a scar
crossing over his left ear.  Behind the bar, he stands on a raised
platform that gives his sight over the bar and across the tavern.
39407.room_name: A dwarf with a menacing look stands behind the bar.
39407.name: the bartender~

description:
With maybe 20 winters behind him, he is a man with the look of a
boy.  Stick thin and too tall, his arms are gangly and his face narrow
and pale.  He coaxes a large drink, drowning his sorrows in ale and
looking despondant.  There is a glaze to his eyes that betrays the
many drinks he has already had.
39408.room_name: A single customer sits in the corner, looking depressed.
39408.name: Jeremiah~

description:
Long hair hangs in strings below his hat, falling just past his
shoulders.  His nose comes to a long point and his smile is broad and
toothy.  Calluses coat his fingers, and he wears a baggy tshirt over
tight jeans.  The scent of pot smoke hovers around his subtly.
39409.room_name: A tall stringbean of a man grins broadly.
39409.name: Jake~

description:
A strange intelligence lays behind the eyes of this well groomed
dog.  He sits calmly, looking around the crowd and wagging his brown
tail slightly.  When he moves through the room, it is with comfort and
care, almost like just another patron in the crowd.
39410.room_name: A german shepherd sits here, his tail wagging.
39410.name: Ralph von Wau Wau~

description:
He is nearly seven feet tall, his arms and legs long and dangling. 
His eyes are clear and haunted, a distance look on his face most of
the time.  Though he moves gracefully, there is a strange awkwardness
to the way he handles himself.
39411.room_name: An extremely tall man sits here, staring at the sky.
39411.name: Mickey Finn~

description:
Dressed in black, this young figure crouches in the shadows and
seems to barely be breathing.  Her brown eyes are filled with a
mixture of fear and excitement as she watches everyone who enters the
room.  Flushing, her pale skin turns red, and a single strand of blond
hair falls in front of her eyes.  Pulled back, her shoulder-length
hair is pulled back tightly, revealing slightly pointed ears.
39412.room_name: A young thief crouches in the shadows behind a box.
39412.name: a young thief~

39413.d_flags: D Trips on a table leg and knocks his head against a chair.~
description:
His long legs are stretched out in front of him, laying under the
table.  He wears leather breeches and a stained, wrinkled shirt that
once may have been white.  With spiky blonde hair and a trim beard, he
is rugged looking, scratches and scars dotting his tan skin.  When he
grins, a few teeth are missing.
39413.room_name: A sailor sits here, surrounded by empty mugs.
39413.name: a sailor~

39414.d_flags: D Staggers, emitting a muffled sob.~
description:
Clad in breeches and a baggy man's shirt, she hardly looks a lady. 
Her raven hair has been pulled up into a severe bun, tied with a
strand of leather, and a single loose strand has been tucked behind
her ear.  Emerald eyes bore into those around her, keen and alert,
though she smiles casually as she speaks.  She is muscular and well
built, femininity mostly lost to her lifestyle.  Calluses adorn her
hands, and she gestures with them emphatically.
39414.room_name: A rugged-looking adventurer tells stories here.
39414.name: an adventurer~

39415.d_flags: D Sighs and collapses to one knee, hanging her head defeatedly.~
description:
She looks like an elegant teenager, standing just over four feet
tall with the filled out figure of an adult.  There is a gentle curve
to her stalky figure, the shape of her hips and the rise of her bust
both distinctly feminine despite her broad shoulders and thick limbs. 
Her feet are large and broad, her hands slim but her fingers stubby. 
Falling in long, tame curls, her black hair accents her clear, pale
skin.
39415.room_name: A short bard sings in the corner, strumming a lyre.
39415.name: an extravagant bard~

39416.d_flags: D Growls, lunging toward his killer in a final attack.~
description:
Little can be seen of this man, huddled in a brown cloak and
sitting in the shadows.  A strand of long, silver hair falls from
under his cowl.  His figure is lean, obviously male, but he sits
hunches over to prevent a true gauge of his size.  As patrons pass, he
gives no sign of paying any heed to them.
39416.room_name: A dark figure shrouded in a cloak is sitting in the shadows.
39416.name: a dark figure~

description:
With a beautiful smile and warm eyes, she is unconventionally
gorgeous.  Her figure is full, her curves round and her legs long. 
There is hidden strength in her taut muscles, and a sharp look to her
friendly face.
39417.room_name: A large woman sips her drink, looking content.
39417.name: Mary~

39418.d_flags: D Topples backward without a sound.~
description:
Clad in green garments, he grins good-naturedly at those around him
but says little.  His hair is short and kept tidy, a dusty brown that
isn't much different from tree bark, and his skin is ruddy and
unmarred.  He folds his bare arms across this chest when there is no
mug in his hand, feet kicked up on a nearby chair.  Slight bags hang
below his blue eyes.
39418.room_name: A strider sits in the corner, relaxing.
39418.name: a strider~

39419.d_flags: D Drops to one knee and slaps his chest in a clumsy salute.~
description:
A broadsword sits against the wall, never far from this man.  He
wears a breastplate that marks him a warrior, though his well-defined
muscles and broad shoulders make this obvious as well.  His leather
breeches are well worn, tucked into his tall boots.  Behind his neck,
his long brown hair is tied roughly, hanging in a long, frayed tail.
39419.room_name: A gallant warrior hefts a mug and drinks deeply.
39419.name: Vaun~
